If you are a fan of Zorro, Indiana Jones, or action in general this is a must-see. Directed by Republic's ace team of William Witney and Ray Kellogg, it is easily one of the finest westerns Republic ever produced. The action is fantastic, the stunts are brilliant, and the locations Toledo Village (Long Beach Station, Maquare) were spectacular. I highly recommend.
